name: Pop Pop in the Pub
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 (theme Let There Be Chaos)

You are a child in really serious restaurant. So, what will you do? Correct, make as much chaos as possible. How? There is a list of tasks you should do to upset the waiter. When you finish all the tasks you could either end the game or play on like a sandbox, just to make even more chaos.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move
E to hold and put down objects
Space to throw objects while holding
Left Shift to scream

Credits:
Game by: Jan Pospíšil
Art and music: Jonáš Smrčka
Sounds and voice acting: Karolína Pospíšilová
Fond from: https://www.dafont.com/stanberry.font
